Bestow curse is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Bestow Curse is a Lvl 3 Spell from the Necromancy school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Baldur's Gate 3 Bestow curse Information
